description: Upon opening any media file window seems corrupted, upon scalling it - whole machine freezes.
i needed asimple way to trim vids that i record on my steam deck. this prog works perfect for me. thanks mad love.
The program seems to work absolutely flawlessly. I'm pretty sure my Ubuntu system is using Wayland too.
can't Open File, dialog seems broken
DOESN'T EVEN OPEN THE WINDOW CORRECTLY

I've used avidemux a while ago and I found it great to join, trim and convert videos. Sadly, since al least F29 it doesn't work anymore with Gnome desktop (I don't remember since when exactly) on a standard 18" monitor because the bottom part stays below level, and I was unable to find a solution to this.
summary: Great app, doesn't work with Gnome

description:
From the Software repository, Avidemux does not display the video correctly due to a build problem it has with QT5. I had to download the source from the Avidemux homepage and build, after installing a lot of dependencies, with the following options:

>>sudo bash bootStrap.bash --rpm --enable-qt4

If you have the dependencies installed (the -devel rpms included), which may take a lot of trial and error, you get a nicely working version of Avidemux 2.7.6.
summary: Repository version doesn't work. Have to rebuild with --enable-qt4

description:
A fantastic tool for cleaning up TV recordings and similar video editing and transcoding jobs.

For some reason, there are a lot of negative reviews here, apparently because the Fedora package did not/does not work. Well, the Flatpak of Avidemux does work very well.

This app used to be nice and easy to use. Now it doesn't even play video. No matter what settings I try, the place where the video is supposed to be, is only showing what is behind the app window.
Not usable in this state.
I am using it quite offten to quickly cut video files without quality loss. It saves very quickly - no need to render. Thank you!

I have been using this software for years now and it really is awesome, it's very user friendly overall and it allows you to do tons of post processing on videos.
Highly suggest trying this out, especially to trim video clips without re-encoding them (if you cut on the keyframes).
summary: user friendly and gets all kind of things done

description: Completely useless! I spent 30 minutes trying to cut a section of video, the software does nothing. Other than playing the video you loaded it does nothing.
I do not understand those who say that it is not useful, the app works perfectly and although it is admitted that its interface is not its greatest virtue, it is really very easy to use.
Makes easy work of muxing XviD's.
Just freezes the machine. Used to be a good tool, but now seems completely broken.

I launch the app, see some settings and choose MPEG-4 h.264 and AAC audio codecs, that is the limit of my knowledge. What are all these other config options? Only for people that know what they are doing. STAY AWAY FROM THIS APP UNLESS YOU REALLY KNOW WHAT U ARE DOING!!
summary: !!ONLY FOR PEOPLE THAT KNOW WHAT THEY ARE DOING!!

description: Used to be workinng fine. It's broken since late Feb 2024 on Fedora39 with default Wayland windowing systen. intermittently freezing, drap and drop for append broken, palyback broken, etc. Semms OK when switched bask to X11 . Please fix it.
The latest Flatpak update broke the output of the display on 3-23-24. I'm using an Intel Arc 770 so maybe that is what was broken... In any case it's not working. I'll try the RPM.
This a must have app. Very capable video editor. Should be in every official repositories (hope it gets into Debian in future). Sadly though it breaks VERY OFTEN :(
Straight forward interface, all relevant functions such as trim time wise, crop to video. all relevant formats present
summary: Short and painless easy video trimmer & basic filters

description: Ein unbedingtes Muss, wenn man viel mit Videos zu tun hat. Einfache Auswahl der Tonspuren und schnelle Umwandlung und einfacher Schnitt.
Muy util para editar videos.
Excelente programa para edición de videos

Sencilla pero efectiva, para eliminar partes de video sobrantes, y comprimir mucho los megas de video, manteniendo una muy buena calidad. Llevo bastante tiempo usándola y tiene muchas opciones para manejar videos.
summary: Muy Buena para cortar y comprimir

description: Tooks 2 minutes and 26 seconds to launch it on a eight core, SSD, 32 Gb RAM !

SE: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS 64 bits
Excellente application de montage vidéo, bravo aux développeurs !
Рекомендую. Свободный. Быстро действует. Кроссплатформенный. Имеет уникальные функции. Очень помогает при подготовке видеоматериала.
Программа не помещается на монитор с разрешением 1366*768. Пользоваться невозможно
